languages.text: "О том, чем нам придется пожертвовать, и том... чем Император жертвует ради нас. Нам было тяжело, но мы не стали сомневаться в воле Его, и в том была наша жертва и наше служение".

traits.locale_text: "О том, чем нам придется пожертвовать, и том... чем Император жертвует ради нас. Нам было тяжело, но мы не стали сомневаться в воле Его, и в том была наша жертва и наше служение".

languages.text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
languages.original_text: "О том, чем нам придется пожертвовать, и том... чем Император жертвует ради нас. Нам было тяжело, но мы не стали сомневаться в воле Его, и в том была наша жертва и наше служение".

traits.locale_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
"We thought of our duty to the Undying One. The honour of the Erebis can. The dark future of the flagship that the Vizsier had scried. A future in which Naaki was destined to play a part."
"We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
"We thought of our duty to the Undying One. The honour of the Erebis clan. The flagship's dark future that the Vizsier had scried. A future in which Naaki was destined to play a part."
"We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
"We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
"We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
"We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

languages.text: « Nous avons avant tout songé au sacrifice qui s'imposait à nous, et... au sacrifice consenti par l'Empereur pour tous Ses enfants. Ça n'a pas été facile, mais nous n'avons jamais douté de Sa volonté. C'était le prix à payer pour Le servir. »
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons avant tout songé au sacrifice qui s'imposait à nous, et... au sacrifice consenti par l'Empereur pour tous Ses enfants. Ça n'a pas été facile, mais nous n'avons jamais douté de Sa volonté. C'était le prix à payer pour Le servir. »

languages.text: «Pensamos en el sacrificio que había que hacer y... lo que se sacrifica por nosotros el Emperador. Fue duro, pero no dudamos de Su voluntad. Fue nuestro sacrificio, nuestra forma de servirle».
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

traits.locale_text: «Pensamos en el sacrificio que había que hacer y... lo que se sacrifica por nosotros el Emperador. Fue duro, pero no dudamos de Su voluntad. Fue nuestro sacrificio, nuestra forma de servirle».

languages.text: 「私達は自分達に迫られた犠牲、そして…皇帝が皆のためにした犠牲を思いました。辛い選択でしたが、皇帝のご意志を疑うことはありません。それが私たちの犠牲であり、奉仕だったのです」
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

traits.locale_text: 「私達は自分達に迫られた犠牲、そして…皇帝が皆のためにした犠牲を思いました。辛い選択でしたが、皇帝のご意志を疑うことはありません。それが私たちの犠牲であり、奉仕だったのです」

languages.text: “我们想到的是不得不做出的牺牲……以及帝皇为我们所有人做出的牺牲。对我们来说，那是个非常困难的抉择，但我们不会怀疑祂的旨意。那是我们的牺牲，我们的责任。”
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

traits.locale_text: “我们想到的是不得不做出的牺牲……以及帝皇为我们所有人做出的牺牲。对我们来说，那是个非常困难的抉择，但我们不会怀疑祂的旨意。那是我们的牺牲，我们的责任。”

languages.text: "Wir haben an das Opfer gedacht, das wir erbringen mussten, und ... an das Opfer, das der Imperator für uns alle erbringt. Es war schwer, doch wir haben nicht an seinem Willen gezweifelt. Es war unser Opfer und unser Dienst."
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben an das Opfer gedacht, das wir erbringen mussten, und ... an das Opfer, das der Imperator für uns alle erbringt. Es war schwer, doch wir haben nicht an seinem Willen gezweifelt. Es war unser Opfer und unser Dienst."

languages.text: "Yapmamız gereken fedakârlığı... İmparator'un hepimiz için yaptığı fedakârlığı düşünüyorduk. Bizim için zordu fakat O'nun arzusundan kuşku duymadık. Bu bizim fedakârlığımızdı, hizmetimizdi."
languages.original_text: "We thought of the sacrifice we had to make, and... of the sacrifice the Emperor makes for all. It was hard for us, but we did not doubt His will. It was our sacrifice and our service."
